review_data.title: Great Malaysian Chinese restaurant in Kreis 5
review_data.content: Wow - really surprised by this place. I rarely eat Chinese in Switzerland as the quality is so hit and miss. This place is great find in Kreis 5. It’s a Malaysian Chinese restaurant Unassuming and very simple when you walk through the door and...More

review_data.title: Ein bisschen Asien in Zürich
review_data.content: Seit das A Fatt an der Limmatstrasse in Zürich eröffnet ist, komme ich immer wieder alleine oder mit Freunden. Auffallend...More

review_data.title: Best Chinese so far!非常好
review_data.content: Best Chinese so far :) Since my wife and I relocated here from Singapore we have been trying to find a good authentic Chinese restaurant. We loved this one: the Siu Yuk (crispy skin piglet meat) was amazing as was the Won Tan soup. As...More

review_data.title: I was rarely so disappointed
review_data.content: At first, the place made a nice impression and the fact that almost all of the decor was taken from a Spanish place made it even more quite likeable. However, when we were served the jiaozi, which were advertised as dim sum, warmed up in...More

review_data.title: Bester Chinese von Zürich
review_data.content: Ausgezeichnetes Chinesisches jnd Malayisches Restaurandt. Die Ente ist perfekt. Auch die Dumplings haben nichts gemeinsam mit den 0815 Varianten aus...More

review_data.title: Delicious Malaysian Cuisine
review_data.content: Came here for dinner with friends and the dishes were pretty authentic and delicious since the Chef was originally from South East Asia.

review_data.title: Delicious food!
review_data.content: I really enjoyed eating in that restaurant. The waitress was very friendly and gave us suggestions regarding the menu. The claypot rice was super tasty and I can only recommend it. An excellent address for good food and authentic atmosphere in Zurich.

review_data.title: Best Restaurant
review_data.content: Ich komme seit Jahren dort Essen und ich kann garantieren, das es eines der besten Restaurants für asiatische Küche ist....More

review_data.title: Delicious authentic Malaysian Food.
review_data.content: Delicious authentic Malaysian cuisine!! Great service too. I am so glad we have A Fatt in Zurich. We are four ladies and we ordered so many dishes. Happy tummies. Name of dishes in caption.

review_data.title: Endlich wieder in Zürich. Die beste Ende der ganzen Stadt
review_data.content: Alles frisch gekocht. WanTan-Suppe alles selbst gemacht... und dann die Ente (kein halbfertig-Produkt) sondern jede Ente selbst gebeizt, abgehanngen und...More

review_data.title: Chinesische und Malaysische
review_data.content: Sehr gute authentische Südchinesische Küche und super Preis-Leitungsverhältnis. Zum Empfehlen sind hausgemachte Ente und Eiertofu !
